brief: A quad is a quadrilateral, a four sided polygon
name: quad()
description:
A quad is a quadrilateral, a four sided polygon. It is similar to a
 rectangle, but the angles between its edges are not constrained to
 ninety degrees. The first pair of parameters (x1,y1) sets the first
 vertex and the subsequent pairs should proceed clockwise or
 counter-clockwise around the defined shape.
syntax: graphics.quad(x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3, x4, y4)

parameters.name: graphics
parameters.description: any object of the type PGraphics
